Content:: Sagara Kariyawasam(born 13 November 1967) is a Sri Lankan lawyer, politician, and Member of Parliament (MP).[1] Kariyawasam was born on 13 November 1967.[1] He is the son of Albert Kariyawasum, who was a renowned politician from Southern province.[2][3] He is a lawyer and general-secretary of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna.[4][5] Following the 2020 Sri Lankan parliamentary election, he was appointed to the Parliament of Sri Lanka as a National List MP representing the Sri Lanka People's Freedom Alliance.[6][7][8] This article about a Sri Lankan politician is a stub.
